code: import _createForOfIteratorHelper from"C:/Win11/Programming/Other/ticket-to-ride-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/createForOfIteratorHelper.js";import{currentSocketId}from"../socket/reducer";export function selectPlayers(state){return state.players;}export function selectCurrentPlayer(state){return selectPlayers(state)[state.game.currentPlayerId];}export function selectLocalPlayer(state){return selectPlayers(state).find(function(p){return p.socketId===currentSocketId();});}export function selectAllBuiltConnections(state){var players=selectPlayers(state);var builtConnections=[];var _iterator=_createForOfIteratorHelper(players),_step;try{for(_iterator.s();!(_step=_iterator.n()).done;){var player=_step.value;if(player.builtConnections.length>0){builtConnections.push({color:player.color,connections:player.builtConnections});}}}catch(err){_iterator.e(err);}finally{_iterator.f();}return builtConnections;}
